description:
Given the level of unemployment brought on by the global repositioning of labor, people in every profession are feeling the need to revisit their fundamental and competency skills. Success:  It’s All In Your Mind is a unique course that utilizes existing formats and identified skill sets with competencies that are transferable from industry to industry and job category to job category in creating unidentified opportunities from seemingly unrelated skill sets, competencies and personal desires to secure gainful employment.

The process highlighted in this course, which the student will walk through, is designed to illuminate opportunities, rekindle past attainable work situations and give back a sense of self worth and personal gratification.
title: Success:  It's All In Your Mind
